extension.name: Filemanager
extension.description: Select, upload, move and delete files.

releases.release: - filemanager field can now hav multiple instances - added filesearch view - selections can now be reordered - selection view can now be displayed in two different modes (`preview` and `compact`) - design changes
- Symphony 2.3 compatibility upgrade (note: this version requires Symphony CMS 2.3 or higher)
- fixed an error when a directory wasn't accessible - improved error handling - replaced some method calls for compatibility reasons
- File ignoring now works as expected

- added support for multiplatform installations (pathhandling etc.) - False error handling for failed uploads - There was an error while creating new directories. New directories were always created in the workspace root folder

- file upload for legacy browser (iframe-transport mode) - Metaviews now retain their states when a directory node gets updated - Fixed some possible pitfalls in case PECL extension `finfo_open` is not available - Fixed some possible putfalls in case of a broken default file igniore regexp fragment
